title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Wales Initiative Fund activities, events, and exercises

description.narrative: Kazakhstan - HRM #4: System Integration: Officer and Contract Personnel. To build a strategic partnership based on a combined effort to provide Assistance with the modernization of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Kazakhstan, including cooperation on human resource management and logistics support. To support the improvement of the model of career development of military personnel (officers and non-commissioned officers (NCOs)). To help the Kazakhstan Ministry of Defense and General Staff create and field a career development system for all military personnel (separately for officers and NCOs) that takes account of the peculiarities of military service in command positions in the headquarters and in the field...

description.narrative: Kazakhstan - Logistics #4: Acquisition and Procurement.
